reviewText: I used to see Bollywood films with Indian friends in the 70s and 80s, and kept reviews I wrote back then. Kathputli follows usual routes but is nicely done and not too OTT. There is little to dislike about it (unless one dislikes Bollywood films per se) and I think most fans of classic Bollywood will enjoy this one. I do admit that the subtitles are not in the best English,though!
